thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com
thread.title: Russell Heffernan
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Russell Heffernan

author: Russell Heffernan
title: Russell Heffernan
text: Getting my washing machine was effortless on my part. Once call to Choice Home Warranty and I was provided a repair facility who came to my home the next day and repaired my machine and the repairment looked like they knew everything about the machine and I had to ask them if they built washing machines for a living because they were that fast and completed the job in minutes.
